long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
BlufVPN - Fast and secure VPN

Why BlufVPN for Chrome? 

With BlufVPN Chrome Extension not only will you save time by having the extension right in the browser, but you also won't have to put up with any additional lags because you are using a VPN. You can start securing your personal information, valuing your privacy and hiding your location. 

Stay safe and secure

Hide your IP and protect your online identity with BlufVPN. You IP address will be the same as thousands of other BlufVPN users when you’re connected to one of our servers. 

Fastest VPN on the market

If you need faster internet connection, connect with BlufVPN. BlufVPN uses the latest encryption methods to ensure that the connection stays intact and our users don’t have to choose between a fast connection and a safe one.

No Log Policy

We don’t keep any logs, we don’t know what you’ve been doing online. 

Online Security Made Simple

Our BlufVPN Chrome extension takes out the extra step of having to open the app on the desktop and connect to a server that way. You can get it all done within Google Chrome.

Easy to Install

Our extension will be up and running instantly. What makes this tool even more effective is that you can easily manage it right from the Chrome window, using the toolbar. 

24/7 live support

BlufVPN support is always available when you need it! 
Contact us by email or chat. 

Useful info & links:

Learn more about Chrome extension: https://blufvpn.com/download/chrome
